resources.string: I agree with terms and conditions
Players list will be updated soon after approval of your match join request by Admin
Players list will be shown only after joining the match

string-array.name: rulesItems
string-array.item: Only players above the age of 13 are allowed to participate.
All games are played on PUBG Mobile, the mobile version only. No emulators Allowed
All players must be registered members of Play360. Your team will be instantly disqualified if an unregistered player plays in a tournament.
Please download all maps and be ready, if you don’t have the map, the match will be started without you.
You are found sharing ROOM IDs and PASSWORDs, you will be instantly disqualified and banned from future.
Griefing and teaming with enemies will result in instant disqualification and team ban.
Hackers will be disqualified instantly. As soon as we suspect a player to be hacking, the team will be disqualified.
Threatening or abusing game admins and other players can result in legal actions and bans from upcoming tournaments.
Players have to make sure to keep their game updated to latest version.
In case of any technical issues from the organizer side, matches can be rescheduled. Players must agree to the new rescheduled time.
Admins reserves all rights to change the match timings and rules if required.
We have a lot of spectators watching to ensure cheating doesn’t take place in the tournaments.
UNREGISTERED PLAYERS will not be entertained in tournaments, and could result in a team ban or player ban. Do not bring random friends into tournaments.
